errorToast.body: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later or contact our support team.
errorToast.title: Error!

notFound.help: The requested page could not be found.

recoverPassword.description: Enter your email address or your username in the input below. A message containing instructions to reset your password will be sent to your email.
recoverPassword.success: A message has been sent to your email. You may close this window now.
recoverPassword.title: Password Recovery

resetPassword.success: Your password has been reset. You may now click the button below to sign in.
resetPassword.title: Reset Password

signIn.invalidCredentials: Please check you provided the correct email address/username and password.
signIn.notConfirmed: Your email has not been confirmed yet. Please check your email messages and your spam folder or contact our support team.
signIn.title: Sign In

signUp.duplicateEmail: The email address is already taken.
signUp.success: A message has been sent to your email. You may close this window now.
signUp.title: Sign Up

confirm.success: Your email has been verified. You may now click the button below to sign in.
confirm.title: Email confirmation

emailOrUsername.label: Email address or username
emailOrUsername.placeholder: Enter your email address or your username

password.label: Password
password.mismatch: Please check you provided your correct current password.
